homeautomation.webservice.resources

Class ResourceSensorStatsImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • homeautomation.webservice.resources.ResourceSensorStatsImage

  • public class ResourceSensorStatsImage
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    Returns the requested stats for a sensor as PNG image.
    Author:
    Philipp Jenke
